attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it illegal to use the term 'free' in relation to medical treatment in the National Health Service and require the term 'Taxpayer Funded' to be used instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS is not free, it is paid for by people like me.  It is grossly offensive to taxpayers and a denial of the truth of the matter to refer to anybody who has not contributed as receiving 'free' medical treatment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
